title: Lightning Strikes Twice
description: Slouching, gum-chewing know-it-all, convinced that her mother's friendship with Mr. Stanley was more than it seemed...that Aunt Nell's hysterics hid a family scandal...That Win Covey's strange death was murder...and that only she could expose the killer...After all, it is little Harriet who knows more about why lightning strikes twice.
author: Jean Potts
